subject: Read this message
body:
Hello

Here at the Audit Department Barclays Bank PLC London , Media and publicity
information Desk , we discovered that in your pursuit of the $18million
inheritance funds release  in Barclays Bank you have been spreading your
bank account and private address information all  over the internet without
looking back no this is very wrong approach to recieving those funds,there
are more conducive way of doing this
We advise you to quickly minimize such act ,so that  you will not find your
Bank account being used by some unscrupulous elements to defraud inoocent
people  of their hard earned money or so
Hence forth you should stop it  it is very wrong

If you really need to get your own funds $18m and the accrued interest of
$475,000 from Barclays Bank PLC respond to this message so that you can be
directed to the right channel

We encourage you to listen and adhere to this directives Accordinglly to
avoid had I know
Expecting your response
Thanks
Yun Michael's
Head Audit
Media & Publicity's
Barclays Bank PLC London
England
